trans-unit.source: Renders the contained 3-D content within the 2-D layout bounds of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref> element.

The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D> element renders 3-D content while providing features consistent with <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement> objects including 2-D layout, clipping, and input events.

When this element is included as the content of a layout element like <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Canvas>, specify the size of the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D> by setting its <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Height%2A> and <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement.Width%2A> properties (inherited from <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkElement>).
<xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D> extends 2-D hit testing into the 3-D scene by extruding the 2-D hit test point into a 3-D ray.
Call the <xref:System.Windows.Media.VisualTreeHelper.HitTest%2A> method to return detailed hit result information about the hit visual, model, mesh, and point of intersection.

On [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_whistler](~/includes/tlasharptla-whistler-md.md)], if the display color quality is not set to 32-bit or 16-bit, the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D> might not render as expected.
Initializes a new instance of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref> class.
Causes the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref> to arrange its visual content to fit a specified size.
Size that <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref> will assume.
The final size of the arranged <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.

Gets or sets a camera object that projects the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] contents of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref> to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] surface of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
This property represents the viewing projection of the [!INCLUDE[TLA2#tla_3d](~/includes/tla2sharptla-3d-md.md)] scene.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
The metadata type on this dependency property is <xref:System.Windows.PropertyMetadata>, not <xref:System.Windows.FrameworkPropertyMetadata>.
The camera that projects the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_3d](~/includes/tlasharptla-3d-md.md)] contents to the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_2d](~/includes/tlasharptla-2d-md.md)] surface.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Camera"></xref> dependency property.
Gets a collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref> children of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
Dependency Property Information
Identifier field
Metadata properties set to `true`
None
A collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref> children of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
Identifies the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children"></xref> dependency property.

Gets the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> at a specified position in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children"></xref> collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
Position of the element in the collection.
Visual at the specified position in the <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D.Children"></xref> collection.
Creates and returns a <xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.Viewport3DAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.
<xref href="System.Windows.Automation.Peers.Viewport3DAutomationPeer"></xref> object for this <xref href="System.Windows.Controls.Viewport3D"></xref>.

Gets an integer that represents the number of <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Visual"></xref> objects in the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.ModelVisual3D.Children"></xref> collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref>.
Integer that represents the number of Visuals in the Children collection of the <xref href="System.Windows.Media.Media3D.Visual3D"></xref>.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
An object to add as a child.
This member supports the [!INCLUDE[TLA#tla_winclient](~/includes/tlasharptla-winclient-md.md)] infrastructure and is not intended to be used directly from your code.
A string to add to the object.
